page.title: 03GOLF FARM
page.content: {Golf Farm}is owned by Mr Gorringe.The farmhouse{map reference is 274091.}The farm is mixed with 1500 bullocks and crops of winter oats,barley and wheat. 90% of his crops are exported from {Shoreham Harbour}to many parts of the world.On the farm Mr Gorringe has two combine harvesters which cost about Â£50,000.He has several tractors that have attachments such as ploughs and cultivating machines. He does not go to markets to buy bullocks,instead he buys week old calves and keeps them for about four years. Five men work on the farm.One is a Mechanic and another is an Accountant.The other three work on the land.He has no sheep but his son keeps sheep on a farm near Eastbourne. In the winter the sheep are brought from Eastbourne to Golf Farm to avoid the wet on the marshland.
